channel.title: Need a few small sprite fixes --> LOOK!
channel.description:
Hello, I am trying to get some of these sprites to load correctly... Take a look:
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/8d5405067c05558715b2e58b267888f95g.jpg[/img]
More detail: I have the all the sprites in my folder for the emotes but it just isn't seeming to load correctly. For the options tab I need to get rid of the multiple dots on one bar. If someone could tell me that'd be Awesome! Third i need to fix the borders of the interfaces as shown in the last picture. Help is appreciated!
Thanks! -Ghostly150

item.title: Need a few small sprite fixes --> LOOK!
